txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Thranduil has been defeated</rgb>
To the east, you see King Thranduil ride up on his mighty steed
'Whether Dol Guldur truly hoped to pierce the heart of fair Lothlórien, or whether it was but a diversion, I cannot say.'
You have arrived in Mirkwood. You have crossed paths with Lord Thranduil himself, and should talk with him.
'Three times tested... and three times failed.'
'Then they struck at us.'
King Thranduil asked you to follow the archers to the north-east, up the hill.
'Because the Elves of Mirkwood were closer by. Because we hold not what far sight and hidden powers have preserved this place.'
'Because they struck with such force and speed, the wounds inflicted were far more grievous.'
You have come to a hilltop in Mirkwood held by Elves and embattled on all sides.
'Great ruin and fire was visited upon much we dearly love.'
'With our backs pressed to the tree and help from our friends, we claimed a hard-fought victory that day.'
You have crossed paths with Lord Thranduil once again in Mirkwood.
'Fight for your homes, my people!'
'Dol Guldur was repelled but we dared not pursue.'
Join your fellow archer to the east, and keep watch over Lothlórien
'Stand and fight!'
Thranduil recounts the trials Mirkwood and Lothlórien endured while Gondor marched and fought at the very gates of Mordor.
'If Sauron wants our land, he will pay for it with blood!'
'Fight for Mirkwood!'
'Stand fast!'
'Let no heart falter!'
Head east and talk to King Thranduil
'Yes, my king! Follow us, soldier!'
'To arms. Quickly - more approach.'
'The beast falls!'
Follow the archers to the north-east, up the hill
'This way, soldier! Follow us to the top of the hill!'
Defeat every attacking enemy on the hilltop. This is the last stand!
Talk to Thranduil on the hilltop
'Their attack falters! It is over!'
Talk to Galadriel
'You are needed in Mirkwood. I fear they will need all the aid that we can spare. Go now.'
'Archers! Take this soldier north-east, up the hill!'
Defend Lothlórien from Orcs and trolls
Defeat Orc-invaders in Mirkwood by the lamp-posts in the wood
Push onward to the east and defeat the Orc-invaders
Head east and protect Galadriel while she readies her defences
DNT talk to lady galadriel
Come to Mirkwood's aid

'From Lothlórien you come? Then hope yet glimmers. Your aid is most welcome here.\n\n'I will move on with my retinue, but you are needed ahead, up the hill! Follow the archers to battle! Perhaps we will meet again, when the fighting is done!'
'Something is wrong. Do you hear that?'
'Orcs!'
'We must help. Draw your weapon. Come.'
'Onwards!'
You are a Lothlórien sentry, keeping watch over the Golden Wood. You should join your fellow sentry up ahead.
'A troll!'
''Toward the river. Come!'
'We have driven them back! You fought bravely, soldier.\n\n'Nay, do not pursue them. Too many of our kin have fallen this day, and we must restore our strength in case they strike at us yet again.'
'The Lady has taken the field.'
Orc invaders have appeared in Lothlórien! Help defend the Golden Wood.
'Quickly, we must rush to her side!'
'You, however, have done your part, and I thank you. Return to your Lord and Lady and have them know that I would share in their council regarding Dol Guldur, as soon as it is safe to do so.'
'You there - you come from Lórien. That is welcome news!'
'You are needed in Mirkwood. I fear they will need all the aid that we can spare. Go now.'
Orc invaders have appeared in Lothlórien! Push onward to where the fighting appears worst.
Orc invaders have appeared in Lothlórien and now Lady Galadriel has taken to the field. Fight by her side and guard her at all costs.
Galadriel has used her powers to defeat the last of this Orc assault. Now she wishes to talk to you.
Instance: The Battle Under the Trees
'DNT you are needed in Mirkwood, friend.'
You have arrived in Mirkwood and come to the edge of the fighting.
